description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin, Polenta & Poppyseed Loaf recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bread,High protein,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Sweet potato,Egg free,Pumpkin,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Pumpkin, Polenta & Poppyseed Loaf Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Remove plastic from vegetable tray. Add bacon, onion and thyme. Transfer to oven and bake for 40 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Cool slightly and roughly mash.

Combine flour, polenta and poppy seeds in a bowl. Add butter and rub in with your finger tips. Stir in buttermilk and 1/2 cup of the cheese. Add cooked vegetable mash. Season with salt and pepper and stir to combine.

Grease and line a loaf tin with baking paper. Transfer mixture to lined tin. Top with remaining cheese and bake for 25-30 minutes or until cooked when tested with a skewer. Slice thickly and serve with butter.
